summary: Textures that make glass armor and weapons appear dark and ice cold.  This is a color change only, I didn't redraw the textures, merely changed the color scheme.
descriptionHtml:
Textures that make glass armor and weapons appear dark and ice cold. This is a color change only, I didn't redraw the textures, merely changed the color scheme.

Just copy the textures folder into your data folder. Look at the screenshot to see how the armor will look like. I'm using it with CBBE with no problems.

Enjoy
author: Jackfuzz
